titles.en: Chapter 35 – Rewards of the one who digs a grave for a Believer

titles.ar: باب ثَوَابِ مَنْ حَفَرَ لِمُؤْمِنٍ قَبْراً
titles.en: Chapter 35 – Rewards of the one who digs a grave for a Believer

text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ سَيْفِ بْنِ عَمِيرَةَ عَنْ سَعْدِ بْنِ طَرِيفٍ عَنْ أَبِي جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ مَنْ حَفَرَ لِمَيِّتٍ قَبْراً كَانَ كَمَنْ بَوَّأَهُ بَيْتاً مُوَافِقاً إِلَى يَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Sayf Bin Umeyra, from Sa’ad Bin Tareyf,
(It has been narrated) from Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘The one who digs a grave for a deceased would be like the one provides a compatible house up to the Day of Judgement’.
